English: Resets all Ideas and Rumors from this mod.
Lets you drag mobs that are tamable even if they are not yet tamed. Untamable mobs cannot be dragged.
It is said that the Blood Extractor can draw something valuable from a corpse... if one dares to try.
Some creatures can be bound. Place an Occult Sigil on top of a mob to attempt to tame it.
Made to house the worst of the worst.
Provides power to all machinery on this board wirelessly.
Two tamed creatures perform a ritual to summon another of their kind.
For processing Tamed Creatures. Progress requires sacrifice.
Processes Remains into Blood and Bones. Waste not!
